Description: Textile fragment, warp and main weft of undyed linen with the remains of a looped pile in linen (c.1cm long) and orange, yellow and green wool (c.8cm orange); design no longer clear but proably geometric, based on horizontal bands; probably from a large furnishing; warp-undyed linen (S/c.21), weft-undyed linen (S/c.7), pile weft-undyed linen (S spun Z ply) with groups of linen thread (S); all edges cut or ragged; rows of loops every 4th shed, a loop mostly after 3-4 warp ends
Curator's comments: Unreg. 15; found 1988? in packet in Keeper's Office
